I have my first 8 original ready to download at 
http://www.cei.net/~dphofrules/scenarios.zip .  They start with #116 
and end at #123.  I am going to work on seting up a legitimate team
to 
 use when testing my scenarios.  I am looking for reviews of what I 
have done so far before I go on further to know that I am on the
right 
 track or I need to adjust some.  Warning:  some scenarios contain 
over 200 enemies.

Fan fiction - That would be interesting which technologies if any 
exist in the universe of Gladiator.  of course one technology that 
would be usefull is some device to measure a character's experience 
level.
